author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update the ZDC description using a new zdc.xml file from Hanna

#### PR validation:

Tested using the overlap checking tool. Some reports on protrusion exist in the new zdc.xml file

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

May be backported to 15_1_X depending on the importance of this new file
title: Run3-gex190 Update the ZDC description using a new zdc.xml file from Hanna
